0.title: Antibacterial cleaning
0.description:
• Suitable for cleaning the skin of the face, body and genitals of the elderly
  • It has a suitable pH and is compatible with all skin types
  • Without causing skin sensitivity, itching and burning
  • Eliminate unpleasant body odor
  • Antibacterial and suitable for daily use
  • Contains aloe vera, chamomile and marigold extracts to maintain moisture and prevent skin dryness
  • Free of alcohol, paraben and soap
  • Quantity: 100 sheets with lid
